replies.body:
Well: I first made a sucky Flaming Roman Centurion, then a kind of better Roman Centurion, then I gave up on my sucky skin making skills.. and used Etho's skin, then I got into this "fire mage phase" after reading Percy Jackson for the 15th time, and creating my own fantasy...
and I got this skin from a random stranger o-o and modified it a bit..
